snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include a look at whether Larry Page of Google is disingenuous to play down competition, and a site that unleashes...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include a look at whether Larry Page of Google is disingenuous to play down competition, and a site that unleashes Internet attacks but whose apparent owner says he works for the F.B.I.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google the Competitor, and a Site Crasher
